name: FNF Bandlab Mayhem [WIP] [HELP WANTED]
description:
Please note that this mod is currently a WIP. All I need is a charter and coder for the mod. If you're up for the job, let me know. My Discord user is P00P36#7620.

Also, when the charts are finished, send them in the form of Google Drive. :)

BPM's for charts: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WJ6HN-fGwUs2RoTP2W0zhBrzjYmsFqlU2mkIFUxat4c/...

One more thing. The image on the right is just what the week will be called and what the song order is.
